# üèÜ Sub-Issue: Gamification & Recognition System

## Goal
Implement community-specific badges, reputation points, leaderboards, and achievement milestones to incentivize quality contributions and recognize members.

## Tasks
- [ ] Design and migrate Prisma schema for badges, reputation, and leaderboards
- [ ] Implement backend logic for badge award, reputation calculation, and leaderboard updates
- [ ] Build frontend UI for badges, leaderboards, and achievement notifications
- [ ] Add custom badge creation for community owners
- [ ] Integrate milestone notifications and flair system
- [ ] Write tests for badge/reputation logic and leaderboard calculations

## Acceptance Criteria
- Gamification features work as described in [parent issue](./community-engagement-core.md)
- Badges and reputation are awarded per rules
- Leaderboards and achievements display correctly
